doc.title: Bari Bogoroditza
doc.plot: The Gypsies celebrate Virgin Mary's Day and endearingly call her Bari Virgin Mary - the slay the sacrificial animal, betroth the young ones, christen their children. The songs and dances bit sort of a farewell to the bountiful summer, before the winter comes over. The gypsies are shown such as they appear in a film made after the script of the young Gypsy poet Hristo Hristov.
